info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 3:56AM EST until January 07 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Widespread snow showers expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Huron County. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow showers to increase in coverage starting through the late afternoon and evening hours. Localized higher snowfall rates and accumulation totals will be possible along the Lake Huron shoreline with any lake effect snow banding that develops. Lake effect snow banding will be more likely late tonight and overnight as winds shift to the northwest. An uptick in winds overnight with gusts around 20 mph may lead to reductions to visibilities with any snow activity.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
